name: Our Magic Window
description: A traditional Yume Nikki fangame, where your objective is to explore and collect "textures" (effects).

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Just a Scratch Pack
description: OK, maybe these cars have seen better days… but what they don't give you in design and aesthetics, it's balanced out with performance that will crush your opponents! Add Speed Bump and Sudden Stop to your collection with the exclusive Just a Scratch Pack!

name: Pokémon Gadir Deluxe
description: Pokémon Gadir Deluxe is a reimagining of the original Pokémon Gadir fan-made game. Embark on a new adventure in the Gadir Region, where you'll challenge gyms and ultimately face the Pokémon League.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Cut-Throat Coast
description: A nautical-themed Banjo-Kazooie ROM hack that takes place in a gloomy seaside town.

name: Ausbruch
description:
Everyone has a reason to come home early.

Help this poor fool get out of prison!
In this long-cherished interpretation of the classic, I let the ball wander through 60 hand-picked rooms.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: TVhTk
description: TVhTk is a teaser game containing various logs related to Nightmare Before Disney 2016 and the 4.0 version of Five Nights at Treasure Island. It is similar to other teaser games such as TBmsTF or TGsEE.

name: Fitment
description: A fitness mobile game for microworkouts. Get motivated to exercise a few minutes a day with Fitment. Collect new moves, items and decorate your world.

name: Exophilie
description:
Heavy scrap metal harsh noise and exploratory, sensory-degrading video game- Exophilie is a training tool to prepare cognitive adaptation in the azathothcene and speculative effects of libidinal anticosmic frequencies on human boundaries.

Interactive visualizer of the album Exophilie by Un Regard Froid. Each track is represented by an explorable space decaying and breaking apart in sync with the noise frequencies.

name: Bumper Stickers MZX
description: The basic concept is simple. You're given a Bumper in the bottom-right. Click on one of the Launchers surrounding the field to launch the Bumper into it. It'll first move in the direction launched, then bump into a wall or another Bumper and start moving in the direction on the Bumper itself. Match three of the same colour horizontally or vertically to clear them off.

name: Bumper Stickers Archipelago Edition
description:
The basic concept is simple. You're given a Bumper in the bottom-right. Click on one of the Launchers surrounding the field to launch the Bumper into it. It'll first move in the direction launched, then bump into a wall or another Bumper and start moving in the direction on the Bumper itself. Match three of the same colour horizontally or vertically to clear them off.

But wait, there's more! This version also plugs into Archipelago Multiworld, so you can try a whole new challenge with your friends!

name: Badpak
description: Small episode with 4 maps of medium size, each with a different texture theme (Base, Metal, Wizard) and a few custom monsters, namely grenade Grunts, nail and rocket Enforcers, and a buggy, poorly executed and out-of-place nail goblin (or something). There is hardly any information in the text file; apparently, the pack was released in an unfinished state, hence the ugly console image and the lack of a boss map. However, the four featured maps are very nice.

name: Tower of Dal Gurak
description: A big castle using Quake III textures. Remake of a map with the same name from the game Blade of Darkness.

name: Arcanum Bonus Maps
description: Two maps originally supposed to be featured as bonus levels in Arcanum. The first one is a small mediaval/fantasy cathedral - a remake of Heretic's E1M6, complete with original textures and music. The second one is a medium-sized arcane industrial complex with a similar vibe as Towers of Wrath from Dissolution of Eternity.

name: Castle of Oblivion
description: Large interconnected Metal castle with a sense of exploration.

name: Bridges & Towers
description: Large interconnected Metal level.

name: The First Attempt
description: Medium to large Metal level.

name: Green Hale
description: Small green temple map using a custom texture set. It also features a custom skybox and the map source is included.

name: Underground Base
description: Large Base map with spacious rooms, linear progression, a very high monster count and a few custom enemies. Comes with a start and a boss map. Map sources are included.

name: Terracity
description: Huge underground necropolis in a Medieval/terracotta theme. It features the gremlin from SoA and has special optimizations for coop gameplay. The map source is included.

name: Black
description: Small episode with three Wizard and one Base level as well as a start map. Also has a few new textures and different endings depending on skill level.

name: The Tomb of Chak Toh Ich`ak
description: A big mayan city.

name: The Death Lair
description: Medium-sized brick/metal dungeon.

name: Empedokles Domain
description: Medium sized Wizard level.

name: Fucking Hostile
description: Medium wizard level in E1M2 style.

name: Who's Gonna Get the Girl?
description: In this comedy role playing game you play the part of a young love starved man whose hopes are sparked to life by meeting a beautiful girl! Will you make it up to her apartment? Will you get to see her excusive lingerie fashion show? Will you find Love? Loads of randomly set variables so as game is different every time you play!

name: 40oz Bounce
description: 15 small / medium sized maps made in three days, with one design constraint: only 40 monsters or less. Built on Copper v1.19 (already included) and map source files are included too.

name: Apocryphauna
description: Content Warning: contains depictions of transphobia, homophobia, religious extremism, and child abuse, along with brief violent and tryphopobic imagery.

name: Discone
description: The first disc in the pondlife disc series; a run & jump & talk 'em-up. an opportunity to interact with your controller.

name: Sex! At Alexanderplatz
description:
Sex! At Alexanderplatz is a performance and dating game set in hell (Alexanderplatz).

Crank the lever of your dating app, let the slot machine spin, let sparks of fury fly, let lonely hearts die (alone).

name: Critical Mass
description:
Critical Mass is a 3 level episode with 4 new weapons and new (or modified) enemies, including boss.
A secret nuclear research facility is under control of the aliens. The only way in is by a special teleport located at a EDF weaponry research building. After killing the aliens the only way out is by a escape turboplane at the hangar.

name: Bottles to the Ground
description:
Duke is at home watching TV and enjoying a few beers, not letting himself being distracted by the explosions that can be heard outside - if that's a new
alien attack going on, it can always wait until his movie is finished. Not feeling ready for some action quite yet and satisfyingly wallowed on his couch, Duke lets his empty beer can fall to the ground and extends his arm to grab a new one - wait a second. No, there really isn't any beer can left in his reach. 'Damn', he mutters, as he struggles against his own will of staying immobile and letting things happen in a purely nihilistic kind of fashion, to drag himself off the couch to the kitchen fridge as a desperate attempt to sustain his now instinctive alcoholic needs. But just as he opens the door, a traumatizing surprise awaits him...

name: Daikarin
description:
An episode with 7 new levels and new art replacing the 2nd episode.
Earth Defence Forces leader has been killed just when a strange artifact has been uncovered. Therefore Duke goes to investigate this at the EDF center. In the meantime, experiments on the artifact reveals its ability to teleport in space and time.

name: Welcome Home
description: Whome takes place in a nicely detailed industrial based city with plenty of explosions, neat sector tricks and solid urban gameplay.

name: The AMC Pleaser
description: Duke's chilling in his apartment doing whatever Duke does while he's home alone, when an explosion outside interrupts his "me" time.

name: Duke 23:4
description: This picks up where Duke 3:16 left off after Duke escapes through the railroad tunnel.

name: Secrets of the Acropolis
description: Duke decides to take a well-deserved vacation. So he packs his bags and heads to the Mediterranean to relax and enjoy the sites.

name: V-Rally: Championship Edition
description: Racing insanity! Over 40 original tracks, 11 official World Rally Championship cars, tracks in 8 worldwide locations, realistic race physics and smooth car handling, diverse terrain such as jungles, canyons, deserts, mountains and more, unstable weather patterns like rain, fog, snow and cloudy. Adjust car performance characteristics to suit varied road conditions. Bonus and hidden cars and tracks to unlock!

name: Whoa Dave!
description: Whoa Dave! is an arcade action game. The action is single screen and the goal is a high score which is increased by collecting coins dropped by defeated enemies. Enemies that make it to the bottom of the stage bounce up from the lava and evolve.

name: Die Scraper
description: A single player city-style Duke Nukem map.

name: Maia
description: Your mission is to eliminate the alien presence from their own soil and find a teleporter to get the hell out of there.

name: Taygeta
description: The sequel to Maia

name: Dukai
description: street-map, inside and outside a chinese/japanese restaurant

name: LipTrip: My Boss is My Heat Suppressant
description: A boss x employee Omegaverse yuri romance where the physical comes before the emotional.

name: FactoryX
description: A chemical factory that needs to be destroyed.

name: The Restless Resort
description: A level with a lot of inspiration from Half-Life, The Restless Resort mixes military base themes with tropical climates.

name: Divadlo
description: 'divadlo' is Czech for theatre, so it's no surprise that this level is set in and around one.

name: Invaders
description: A short space themed level

name: Docking Doom
description: Duke is a regular cargo inspector, sent to orbiting space docks to check for illegal cargo. As a routine check up on the dock station, Zero Alpha, finds Duke uninterested, a sudden distress signal comes up for only a second. Duke grabs his pistol and locks and loads.

name: WSYC Remix
description: We Store Your Crap Remix is a warehouse/ industrial themed level

name: Asylum K
description: Just blast'em all... You'll think later... Maybe.

name: Eye-Witness
description: You're watching Itchy and Scratchy and it's annoying you so you've decided to go outside and when you just get out of the door you hear this awful crashing sound and you've

name: Freedom
description: Freedom revolves around a brilliantly designed villa

name: On Him Their Lives Depend 01
description: A large urban level with action aplenty

name: Extermination
description: Extermination is a well layed out city level, the map is packed tightly in and around the main street.

name: U R Hell
description: A haunted computer simulator.

name: Fruit Loops
description: A map taking place in an industrial complex

name: BobSP Series
description: A collection of all 5 Bobsp maps (Bobsp1-4 + x)

name: Voyeur Hotel
description: A rather professional looking multilevel hotel map

name: Anarchy City 1: Atomic Version
description: Anarchy City is an action packed romp through an urban landscape.

name: Anarchy City 2: Neighbourhood Nightmare
description: This first sequel to Anarchy City boasts more hardcore action

name: Anarchy City 3: Zero Tolerance
description: A large and highly imaginative level, Anarchy City 3 is an urban-styled map with great architecture, terrific spritework and solid gameplay.

name: Happy Hangover
description: Duke is headed downtown for a little R & R only to find those alien bastards have taken over the city and are drinking up all the booze in his favorite bar. That dog don't hunt so it's time to kick some alien ass and eliminate the vermin.

name: Overtime
description: Overtime is a furiously fast-paced level involving a supermarket and a carpark of death

name: Rural Nightmare
description: A meteorite crashed in the southern village and aliens took over the northern village. The few inhabitants who survived started to build walls all around the place to prevent the aliens from coming in but they didnt have enough time and the aliens did manage to come in. You wake up in your bedroom after a bad dream and thats where the level starts. Find your way to the village and kick some alien asses

name: Provide Relief
description: Provide Relief is a nicely long-winded level involving Moscow, paranormal phenomenon and a decidedly alien presence rising up from underground.

name: AlexCity 1: Bank Heist
description: A city at night themed level

name: AlexCity 1: Bank Heist
description: A city at night themed level

name: Criaturas de la Noche
description: Duke enjoys a dream at his parents' house

name: Chinatown
description: Those evil aliens are in Chinatown, so kill them

name: Overkill
description: A fun, fast-paced level set in a nuclear facility with more action, explosions and monsters than you could poke a comfortably sized stick at.

name: Fernocity
description: You're in Fernocity, the most corrupt city in the world. A level with loads of action, and lots of places to explore: A pier, a strip club, an abandoned power plant, an arcade store, a bank, and even a haunted apartment building! And much, much more!

name: Streets of Gotham City
description: A city level with lot´s of different stores, including a library and a cinema.

name: Cerberus
description: After learning the location of the alien homeworld. Duke is drawn off course by a distress call from Cerberus station, an enormous deep space platform watching over a nearby darkmatter nebula. His ship is ambushed by several alien fighters which he destroys but at a heavy cost. He must now dock with Cerberus both to find out what happened to it and repair his ship (or secure another one).

name: Descent into Hades
description: Descent into Hades is a military base level

name: Decay
description: Decay is a dark, atmospheric, rather deadly level set in a ruined city.

name: Jellyfish Archipelago
description: A top-down action game where you guide a cat across multiple levels to collect gems while avoiding dangerous jellyfish.

name: Dragon's Lair
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon's Lair
description: Sin descripción

name: Keiji J.B. Harold no Jikenbo: Murder Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Klonoa 2: Lunatea's Veil
description: Klonoa 2: Lunatea's Veil is a remaster of the original 2.5D platformer game, released for modern consoles with enhanced graphics. The game was bundled with Klonoa: Door to Phantomile in the Phantasy Reverie Series. This is actually the first time Lunatea's Veil has had any sort of rerelease since its debut on the PS2.

name: Babes Reloaded
description: Babes Reloaded is a reasonably fast-paced romp through a Babeland resort and a WSYC facility

name: City Full Of Alien Scum
description: New city map that takes place at night

name: Dark Place 1
description: Dark Place is a huge level with plenty of atmosphere, wonderful ambience, detail and puzzles

name: Dark Place 2
description: This sequel to the first Dark Place is just as large and involved, with not so many enemies

name: Dark Place 3
description: This third in the series takes place in some icy setting - a healthy mix of light industrial and ski park themes.

name: Dark Place 4
description:
Dark place 4 takes place in a grey and rocky planet full of lightning, rain and strange
noises

name: Dark Place 5
description: Dark screens and gloomy corridors.

name: Myst
description: This handheld version of Myst is a reworked re-release of the original game. It is similar in content to Real MYST as it contains Rime Age, the fifth age with additional content that was added in that release.

name: Dogville
description: Another day, another city overrun by the alien hordes. You start in an apartment, lightly armed, and as you look out the window, you not only get to enjoy some enemies trying to plug you full of holes, you get to enjoy an incredible view.

name: Just Another Christmas
description: You are in a snowy town overrun with aliens, equipped only with your pistol and some mean Christmas spirit swilling around inside you.

name: Subsuelo
description: The intelligence services have discovered an alien base in the underground of the city, and they have found out that this group of extraterrestrials of the faction of leader Edward, better known as Eddie, they are preparing a worldwide attack on the earth. Duke is the last hope Humanity must destroy that underground base.

name: Sewage
description: This takes place in a Canadian sewer system and end's up at the Parliament Building in Ottawa.

name: Polaris Outpost
description: A space station map of the same quality as the original E2 maps

name: Sin Center
description: Sin Center is a single player map made as a tribute to the classic style city maps of the original game.

name: Galbadia
description:
Galbadia is a single-player modern style city map for Duke Nukem 3D which involved 4 mappers.
Duke is sent to Galbadia to investigate claims of a secret alien hive nearby, the purpose of which is believed to be using captured local babes to breed alien drones. Duke rents an apartment near the central park and takes a shit. Upon learning of Duke's presence, the hive Overlord commands his troops to seize the town as a means to protect the hive. Next thing you know, you've got Recon Cars circling the park while an alien breach squad is on its way to your apartment. Your task is to locate the hive and kill the Overlord.

name: YMF500G
description: Duke was sent to an EDF base in the orbit of Earth, called "YMF500G" and while he was doing a test mission the base was attacked by aliens, so they disconnected the radio systems and killed all the people in the base. So, Duke must reconnect the communication systems to get help from Earth.

name: Alien Wipeout
description: Duke takes the spaceship and starts his long way to the alien base. After three days in there, he finally looks at some strange organic structure. "Where the hell did they send me to?" says duke. "Bah, there is no time to waste!". So he gets inside the mothership and prepares his gun to kick some alien ass!

name: The Brave New World
description: The Brave New World takes place some ten years after the events of 11/09/01 in a reality which is not altogether too different from our own. Brave New World features five levels.

name: Treasure Hunter Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Nightshade Army
description: Night themed action packed map made in 2010

name: 60 Minute Marathon
description: You've heard of wads with three hour maps. You've heard of wads with one hour maps. But here today we give you a vanilla, 32-map megawad made entirely in one hour and streamed on twitch.

name: Obzen
description: OBZEN is a set of 32 limit removing CL4 maps for the Plutonia IWAD. These are short maps with low monster counts (100 or less, unless playing co-op) with a heavy emphasis on high difficulty, evil traps, and hard fights.

name: Soaked in Blood
description: A TWID-esque Ultimate Doom episode replacement, Soaked in Blood! It's a vanilla mapset in the style of Knee-Deep in the Dead with some modern twists. Ultra-Violence is the preferred difficulty though feel free to pick what suits your skills.

name: Flatland
description: You're exploring a desolate UAC outpost in the middle of an ocean.

name: Godzilla 1998
description: The map is a cityscape with several references to the 1998 movie Godzilla. Large footprints, a gash in the building from his tail, and an underground burrow with egg chamber are all from the movie.

name: Plants Vs. Zombies Expanded and Enhanced
description: Sin descripción

name: Plants vs. Zombies Reseeded
description: Plants vs. Zombies Reseeded is a full game pvz mod, built off my old mod titled PvZ rebalanced, featuring reworked adventure levels, new mini-games, new puzzles, new survivals, and every plant being reworked, along with a lot of zombie reworks! There are also 5 difficulty modes, including some challenge modes, like respeeded mode!

name: Here Is Where I Carve My Heart
description: A solitary pyramid that exists to remind you that you are wondrous

name: Lines
description: Lines is an unlicensed Russian port of an IBM match-five game called Color Lines for the NES.

name: Grimace vs. Skibidi
description: Help Grimace stop the tennis balls fired by Skibidi Toilet. It takes speed and precision, make one mistake and you’re out!

name: Grimace Drop
description: Grimace Drop is an unofficial 60 level puzzle game based on the Grimace Shake meme. The aim of the game is to help Grimace safely reach the grass block by removing blocks until he reaches it.

name: The Fall and Rise of Sadcock-upon-Avon
description:
In the fiefdom of Sadcock-upon-Avon, strange things are happening. There are rumours of penises not looking or acting as they should...

Follow the witch Agnes Nutt as she magic-spells cursed phalluses back to health, saves or destroys marriages, shapeshifts, and more!

name: Snezhnaya Koroleva
description: Snow Queen is an unlicensed game based on the 2012 Russian movie based on the same game. The game is a rom hack of Mick And Mack as the Global Gladiators with entirely new levels.

name: Snezhnaya Koroleva
description: Snow Queen is a bootleg NES game based on the 2012 movie Snow Queen.

name: Beggar's Paradise
description: Join the adventure in Beggar's Paradise, the ultimate idle clicker game. Upgrade your items and progress through the levels by tapping and earning money. Build your own economy and watch it grow as you become the richest beggar in the land. Simple, fun and addictive! Beggar's Paradise will keep you entertained for hours. Download now and see for yourself why it's the ultimate time-killer game!

name: You are Grounded!
description: It´s 1997, Haddonfield, Illinois. You are trapped in the basement. Father is upstairs. He has been drinking all day. He wants to come down to give you a lesson. Do you have the guts to survive?

name: Scribble
description: Use your ink to draw bridges, walls, and more to save the blots.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Unstoppables Pack
description: Talk about the opposites attract. On the one hand, the elegant lines of a bullet made to hit the track like F1 Racer. On the other, a massive concentration of unstoppable power like Sand Burner. Having them in your collection will get you past any obstacles!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Speed Kings Pack
description: A statement of style and speed on the track. Supercharge your collection with the vehicles of the Speed Kings Pack! The fearless and stunning Impavido 1, and the technological Electro Silhouette, to make your victories even more electrifying!

name: Bloody Checkers
description: Enter the medieval world of Knotted Hand Hall, and take on 20 dead NPC’s who will try and stop you at all costs. Enjoy 30 hours of leveling, exploring, and hiding as you take everything you have learned online. Gorgeous graphics and 3D gameplay almost go unnoticed as the action overtakes you and you become immersed in volleys of spells, arrow barrages, and cannon attacks from your opponents.

name: Meteor Blastor
description: An Asteroid type game. It was one of the first two games by the studio Flipline Studios, and it was released in October 17th 2006 on their website as a Flash Game.

name: Lost Budapest
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2: The Adventures of Gilbert and Hank
description: Sin descripción

name: DawnCraft
description: DawnCraft is an RPG Adventure Modpack for Minecraft created by bstylia14. The modpack uses almost 300 mods to make an amazing new fantasy world for you to explore.

name: Pokémon Sweet Version
description: Welcome to Pokémon Sweet Version, where battles are carried out with the power of dessert! Travel through a confectionate wonderland that resembles Kanto but is quite different, as those who explore will soon discover! Capture 151 candified Pokémon and fill up the pages of your Cookbook! We've spared no expense in making the experience unique, which is why there is a brand-new type chart consisting of twelve flavors of ice cream. (Apple is totally a flavor of ice cream.) And if you're sick of Kanto, you'll be pleased to know this is totally not Kanto, no matter how much it seems to be. As the world is designed to reward exploration, there's something waiting in every map that may not have been there before, whether it's a cleverly hidden item or a dreadfully bad pun. (We have plenty of those.) The PokéSweets themselves are as delicious as they look, and they look good enough to eat!

name: Crossroads OS
description: Explore the mysterious operating system Crossʀoad OS. Adventure through its decaying programs, solve puzzles, collect items and meet strange creatures.

name: Pokémon Fairies
description:
A short, sweet and simple game,1 hour of playtime. No battles or Pokémon capturing, only story and puzzles. An enchanting world in the clouds, in an alternate universe!
Fairies, friendship and magic! More fluff than a Wigglytuff! More cheese than an Aromatisse! More pink than a mutated Carbink!

name: Hell Girl
description: A re-imagination of Pokémon Emerald’s Battle Pike!

name: The PenguinGame 2: Lies of Penguin
description: The heroic penguin pulled the legendary club from the rock. pass the ordeal! Revenge on humans! Save Antarctica in crisis! The Penguin Game2 : Lies of Penguin is an action game made with a deep impression of the soul-like genre. Challenge a total of 7 types of boss battles!

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 1 - Legend of the Golden Witch
description: A remake of the first episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 2 - Turn of the Golden Witch
description: A remake of the second episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 3 - Banquet of the Golden Witch
description: A remake of the third episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 4 - Alliance of the Golden Witch
description: A remake of the fourth episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 5 - End of the Golden Witch
description: A remake of the fifth episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 6 - Dawn of the Golden Witch
description: A remake of the sixth episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 7 - Requiem of the Golden Witch
description: A remake of the seventh episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Tokyo Twilight Busters
description: Sin descripción

name: Bust-A-Move 3
description: A Port of Bust-a-Move 3 for the Sega Saturn.

name: Angelique Duet
description: Sin descripción

name: Summon Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Summon Night 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Akagawa Jirou Mystery: Tsuki no Hikari - Shizumeru Kane no Satsujin
description: Sin descripción

name: Syberia
description: Sin descripción

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 8 - Twilight of the Golden Witch
description: A remake of the eighth episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Kpop Piano Game: Color Tiles
description: Play Kpop music on the piano and train your reaction. More fun if it is played together with friends.

name: Lamar: Idle Vlogger
description: A guy who drives a rust bucket cannot repay a debt to his friend and decides to become a blogger. He is denied a loan for a cell phone and borrows it from a friend. This is his last chance to make it out of the slums.

name: Shaky Grounds Series
description: Custom episode for Duke Nukem 3D. 5 epic maps filled with intense battles, destructive earthquakes, a post-apocalyptic atmosphere and an evolving storyline Also contains a custom soundtrack especially written for this episode.

name: Discarded Stronghold
description: EDF base has been overrun by aliens who are now looting the base, searching for information that could jeopardize the existence of mankind. Duke has been sent to investigate the base, or what's left of it, and make sure that no alien survives.

name: Riverside Town
description: This map takes place in a riverside town

name: The Space Mission
description: This two-map space episode is High Treason's first solo effort

name: Nitroglycerin
description: Nitroglycerin picks up where Quantum Physics left off. Duke exits the EDF Base by riding an elevator back to street level. In the North of the once popular holiday destination of Seaside city the industrial zone is dark and mostly disused. The EDF have learned that the alien invasion stems from a ship that was crash landed near the old city hall, these aliens weren't meant to invade, they were merely a scouting party, but when they crashed they deployed troops to find parts to repair their ship. The problem is that if the scouting party fix that ship, there are bound to be other aliens waiting to hear from them and if they hear Duke Nukem is around, they will probably all descend on the planet and cause a war.

name: Alien Abductee
description: Alien Abductee continues on from Nitroglycerin and sees Duke aboard a damaged alien ship, limping its way back to their home planet. Duke was abducted and must find a way back to earth, unfortunately this ship won't turn around and even if it did, it was too badly damaged in the crash to survive the journey or re-entry into earth's atmosphere. As such, the best course of action is to cripple the ship so that it never flies again and find a way back before it's too late, the aliens probably won't treat you very nicely if the ship makes it back to their home world.

name: Dimension Shift
description: After escaping the alien planet in Alien Abductee using a stolen ship, Duke returns to earth but is blown out of the sky by the mysterious red ship. Escaping through the small hatch in the side of the cockpit and falling towards a lake, Duke now finds himself in front of an old forgotten house. Whilst it is overgrown and looks abandoned he can't shake the feeling that someone is watching him from behind those dark windows. The bushes too thick to pass and the door surely jammed, the only way in is through the basement but it quickly becomes clear that something is very wrong here.

name: Submachine
description: A brand new map for Duke Nukem 3D (requiring EDuke32) with a hi-tech theme. The map will mostly focus on solving puzzles, clever minigames, nonlinear gameplay progression and lots of secrets to explore, thus requiring the player to think logically rather than just rely on their reflexes and combat skills.

name: Back in Business
description: An entirely new episode of 4 levels with various themes: city/casino, nature/industrial, snowy/hi-tech and prison/nature. Each level has a strong mission objective to complete.

name: The Wall
description: An interactive rock opera, a conceptual map based on the movie Pink Floyd The Wall.

name: Forever and One More Day
description: A medium-size city map where Duke gets to visit the headquarters of his makers.

name: Paddle! Shimmyoumal!
description: This game is a secondary Touhou game in which Shimmyoumaru is the main character.

name: Day After Forever
description: A large city map

name: Desert Complex
description: A sequel to Forever and One More Day and Day After Forever. Desert Complex is a medium-size hi-tech/desert map.

name: Brainwash Facility
description: Duke after travelling lots of miles finally cached a bus. A bus, which took to a small, suspicious village. A village with big psychiatric hospital at the center. It looked evil at very beginning of Duke's adventure. It indeed was...

name: Border Town
description: The aliens have set up shop in a mine next to the town and Duke needs to get in there and flush them out.

name: Blink of an Eye
description: A continuation to my previous map - Border Town. As usual - theme of the map is set in the city. This time it's set at evening/night.

name: Beach Community Build Project
description: Those alien scum have once again ruined Duke's vacation, and it's up to him to fight his way across the beach-covered bay towards the dam to deactivate the portal that they're using to transport to Earth. The map is more original than the plot.

name: The Dream
description: Game story take place in Duke's dream (while he fall asleep after some sensitive dose of booze, or maybe after saving the world one more time). In his dream his shuttle was rammed by enemies helicopter. Duke managed to jump safely on the ground and found himself on the streets of the unknown city....

name: A Dream 2
description: As its name suggests this is the sequel to Eddy's atmospheric, trippy first map The Dream.

name: Moonbase Accident
description: A 7 map episode set in space with 2 secret levels and 2 additional DM maps.

name: Sunshine Complex
description: Duke is trapped in a warehouse that's infested with hordes of aliens. Nothing to do on a lazy afternoon but to lock and load.

name: Afterglow; Twin Creeks
description:
This level is the third chapter in the Afterglow series.
The map is a blend of: Industrial, small city and wasteland.

name: Alien Resurrection
description: A sequel to the previous Alien series tribute map Nostromo. In this follow up based on the fourth movie, the player is given the mission to explore the space vessel USM Auriga and rid it of alien occupation.

name: Afterglow: A New World Rising
description: Set in a huge city-affair infested with alien vermin in huge quantities, Afterglow: A New World Rising can be classified as one large city map cluttered with splendid architecture and brilliant gameplay plotting.

name: QMC: Puritan
description:
A map with a few rooms given from the contest starter Quakis. The rest is built freely.
As usual it's a citystyled map

name: Afterglow; The Scent
description: The predecessor to this level is: "Afterglow; A New World Rising". This time Dukes hometown is under heavy attack from the evil twinbrothers.

name: Undesirable Elements
description: Undesirable Elements is a top-notch space level taking place on Europa, a high-tech outpost for the Earth's elite. Supposedly alien free, they have nonetheless attempted to make a foothold in the base - and as usual it's your job to sort the mess out.

name: Ablaze
description: Those alien bastards have built a base in the mountains. Your mission: destroy it.

name: Bruise Mining Company
description: The sequel to Ablaze, Bruise Mining Company is another fast paced romp through alien infested installation. This time they've taken over a uranium mining operation and as usual it's your job to flush 'em out.

name: Unaided Mission
description: This is a continuation of Bruise Mining Company. After Duke destroyed Bruise M C. facility,he continues to the secret alien launch area. This must be destroyed!

name: Neutron Base: The Arrival
description: This level is a continuation of Unaided mission. Just before Duke destroyed those alien bastards launch facility he discovered a secret launchbay. He soon understood that the bosses had their own way of escaping Duke. Now he followed in their footsteps and decided to find their base!

name: Nostromo
description: Based on the ship Nostromo from the movie Alien, Duke must get aboard and set off the self destruct sequence that failed when Ripley activated it.

name: Done & Dusted
description: A medium sized map with Hi-tech indoor locations and island styled outdoor areas.

name: EDF Computer Base
description: An EDF styled instillation that's been overrun by aliens.

name: Quantum Physics
description: A mix between urban surface areas and EDF undersea like installations.

name: Bizarre
description: Bizarre takes you to a world gone topsy-turvy, where the laws of physics seem not to apply, the buses run on time and the dregs in home-made beer is the best bit

name: Illusion
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Moves
description:
2015 Game developed for the CPCRetroDev contest of that year as a personal challenge of its creator, Toni Ramirez. And even being a very respectable title, it underwent a major transformation, trying to enrich it, about five years later, as a final review in which more stages, enemies and some other substantial improvement were added, with the invaluable help of great musicians and graphic designers.

Both proposals honor their declared desire to pay homage to the legendary Army Moves and Navy Moves from Dinamic Software. That is, good graphics, good music, super addictive, with high difficulty levels.

name: Tuiterland
description:
Tuiterland is a Twitter playable parody made by @SkulleD42. You can interact with a lot of users, play with one of the 40 available avatars, play various minigames and, of course, live the profound and convoluted story of the game.

The game can be played on Android using the free emulator "JoiPlay" available on Google Play Store, but slight visual glitches may appear.

name: Tuiterland 2 v2.0
description:
Rediscover the world of Twitter five years after the events of the first game. Fight for the freedom of memes, travel into Facebook, help users in trouble, confront imposing bosses, choose your avatar among a total of 48, form a party of up to 9 characters and much more in Tuiterland 2!

The main affix of the 2.0 version, released on December 23rd 2018, is the Combat Arena, where you may fight powered up versions of both main story and optional bosses alike. Also, special guests may appear to challenge you.

The game can be played on Android using the free emulator "JoiPlay" available on Google Play Store, but slight visual glitches may appear.

name: Tuiterland 3
description: Everything you need to know about Tuiterland 3, the biggest playable parody on social media!

name: Tuiterland 3 Definitive Edition
description:
Everything you need to know about Tuiterland 3, the biggest playable parody on social media!
The Definitive Edition is an updated version of the game released on February 2nd 2023 that fixes bugs and adds some changes and new content to the game detailed in a txt file.

name: Tuiterland 0rigins
description: Live the traves of the main three superusers of the series and the motives behind their outcomes! Discover the origins of many of the iconic characters of the series and visit new regions formerly never seen in this prequel set 10 years before the events of Tuiterland 1!

name: Tuiterland 4
description:
Explore the vast region of 4chan, discover all of its secrets and discover new and extravagant characters in this new entry of the Tuiterland saga! Tuiterland 4 has a clear distinction from the rest of the series: we don't visit Twitter at any time!

Even though it only has one playable region, 4chan is the vastest region of the Social Network Contintent, as it was revealed in Tuiterland 3 and Tuiterland 0rigins, so there's no need to worry about not having enough places to explore!

What mysteries will you find? What unpredictable situations will happen? How is the story connected to the other entries? All of this and much more will be discovered in this new entry, the new generation of the Tuiterland saga!

Tuiterland 4 has been developed to be the ultimate Tuiterland experience, being the game with most story cutscenes, lots of side content in terms of stories and map exploration and the most refined combat system. We hope you like it!

The game can be played on Android using the free emulator "JoiPlay" available on Google Play Store, but slight visual glitches may appear.

name: Paltokes and the Sphinx
description: Delve into the mystical world of ancient Egypt with "Paltokes and the Sphinx," an enthralling puzzle game. Players must skillfully position descending pieces onto the board, aiming to construct complete horizontal lines. With each level, the pace quickens and the challenges grow, all set against a backdrop adorned with hieroglyphics and iconic Egyptian symbols. Harness your strategic prowess and navigate the puzzles to unveil the secrets guarded by the Sphinx.

name: Halfquake
description: You've made a terrible mistake in your past. Thankfully, a bunch of sadists have constructed traps for your punishment.

name: Halfquake Amen
description: Part two of the Halfquake series.

name: Halfquake Sunrise
description: The third part of the Halfquake series.

name: Mapleland
description: Mapleland is an RPG-style world content being serviced on the MapleStory Worlds platform. Reconstructed from the past MapleStory, Mapleland invites you to relive your memories!

name: Luigi's Mansion Beta Restoration
description:
Luigi's Mansion Beta Restoration is a 1:1 recreation of the early playable demo of Luigi's Mansion seen at E3 2001.
LMBR includes ALL of the highly requested features seen at E3 2001, including 1:1 models, visuals, music, the iconic purple scare ghost, and more!
Everything you see has been faithfully drawn down to the bone, with the most accurate assets EVER publicly displayed before. Can you find them all?

name: Fireblue Jam
description: A once-sealed evil has found new life in the realms of Quake! Blast your way through 11 maps featuring the most infamous texture from DOOM, FireBlu! Made using Dumptruck_ds's Speedmapping Progs

name: Seraphim Slum
description: Befriend a girl, fall in love, and break them by awakening them. Teach them to go against their mental constraints, to fight back against their oppressors. Push them over the edge.

name: Dare to Dream
description: Two small maps, a classic-style base themed intro and a castle themed conclusion. Uses custom music by Angryfrogs, custom skyboxes by Makkon / Sock, and some id1 and mg1 textures.

name: Cimmerian Night
description: Three-map mini-episode with a small base level, a medium-sized nonlinear wizard-style map, and a large homage to E4M4- The Palace of Hate. It comes with custom music tracks. The map sources are incuded.

name: Fall Cleaning
description: Small to medium mansion with constant monster teleports and some arena combat situations, produced for Tronyn's Halloween Haunted House mapping exercise.

name: The Temple of Blooooood
description: Large blood temple. The map source is included.

name: Hushed Walls
description: Small to medium-sized level in Gloom Keep style, with a dark brick dungeon beneath. The map source is included.

name: Fortress Interior
description: Large classic-style mountain base map. Map source is included.

name: The Journey Home
description: Small egypt style outpost surrounded by snowy mountains.

name: Ravisod
description: Mini-episode with two around medium-sized base levels and a start map. The map sources are included.

name: Torture
description: Small Wizard/Metal map with torture chambers and some neat masks.

name: IfSunSets
description: IfSunSets is a Survival Game with Adventure & RPG elements. By day, you have to gather supplies for your survival on this island. As night falls, you will encounter strong and dreadful enemies that will relentlessly hunt you down.

name: Myst
description: This version of Myst is an expanded version of the original Nintendo DS release.

name: Bust-A-Move 3 DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Outride Obama
description: A thrilling racing game against a former US president. Test your speedrunning skills in this absolute beaty of a game.

name: Keys, Please
description: A game where you use keys to unlock doors to get more keys.

name: Miami Vice
description: An arcade style game where you take on the roles of cops Crockett and Tubbs to stop a ferocious criminal from causing harm. Traverse through warehouse with enemies dropping bombs on you, race to catch up to the criminals in a boat, and confront them at their warehouse.

name: The Super Penguboy
description: Help little Super Penguboy overcome all the challenges in the Dark world!

name: Virtual Families 3: Our Country Home
description: Virtual Families 3: Our Country Home is a new way to play! Now a premium experience with no micro transactions to buy!

name: Troublemaker: Raise Your Gang
description: Grab a backpack, boxing tape, and focus on what high school is all about: Beating the ever loving crap out of one another! Troublemaker blends favorite action-adventure-beat-'em-up elements from the strongest traditions in the genre.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Terraformers: Aim High Bundle
description: Get two strategy games in a bundle! Weedcraft Inc + Terraformers

name: Bubble Shoot Farm
description: Bubble puzzler full of farm animals!

name: Bullet Rodeo
description: Draw your weapon from the holster, keep your fingers near the trigger and prepare to fight merciless bandits!

name: Clan's Revenge
description: In 'Clan's Revenge, two young ninja train together, but one becomes a villain, triggering a confrontation between former friends in this visual novel full of shocking decisions.

name: Toonsters: Crossing Worlds
description: Travel the world and catch many Toonsters to build your team and become the biggest Toonsters collector!

name: D Laser
description: You are constantly flying from side to side and slowly climbing up. You turn every time you hit the sides of the screen. Your goal is to avoid being hit by the laser shooting from the top and take cover under the descending skydivers. Press a button to turn and hold a button to stay in place. If the laser hits you, it will push you down and you also descend slowly when you stay still.

name: Mo.co
description: mo.co is the brand new IP from Supercell, starting with limited North American Beta for Android in October 2023.

name: CityDriver: Autobahn Nord
description: With the "Autobahn North" DLC for CityDriver, new routes, missions and locations await you!

name: DeResolution
description: BANG...You awake to find yourself in a foreign place called TH3 GR1D. Explore, fight, and throw your digital vorpal frisbee to escape this digital landscape.

name: City Zombie Madness
description: City Zombie Madness is a tower defense game in a post-apocalypse military zombie setting.

name: Conquest of Empires 2
description: My Liege, welcome to Conquest of Empires 2, an epic war strategy game! Explore our encyclopedia of Ancient Civilizations. Launch your first session and experience the rise and fall of history.

name: VegeMine
description: Under tier upon tier of dark stratas, there grows endless vegetables, dig them, merge them, then eat them! This is a rouge-lite strategy game in which you play as a rabbit digging for vegetables, increasing your power as you advance through layers until you reach the final treasure!

name: Cyber Blade: Action Platformer
description: Cyber Blade is an adrenaline-pumping cyberpunk action game with a pixelated twist! Destroy your enemies to the beat of stylish music, dodging traps and lasers!

name: Hell Let Loose: Luftwaffe Eagles
description: Add a new dimension to the battlefield with the Luftwaffe Eagles DLC. As part of the German Luftwaffe forces, the Fallschirmjäger were the first paratroopers to feature in large scale airborne based operations.

name: Railbreak
description: Power through hordes of zombies, '90s arcade style, in this on-rails survival horror shooter.

name: Rescue Cable
description: A puzzle game to connect all of power nodes with an electrical cable.

name: The End of Nowhere
description: A cold game set in a remote Alaskan town. Waking up in a freezing Alaskan town, you are forced to survive against creatures that you have never seen before. Balance your scarce resources against the threats that inhabit the town, and find a way to escape this frozen hell.

name: Impossible
description: This is a quick reaction game.

name: Archery Red
description: Dive into a futuristic world as an archer, aiming to hit targets and vanquish robotic foes. Experience advanced mechanics and realistic shooting in an engaging single-player campaign or endless mode. Ready for the challenge?

name: GX Sudoku
description: GX Sudoku is just a basic classic Sudoku game., fill in the boxes to complete the game

name: Mana Quest
description: What can you do when you've been isekai'd by mistake and you're just a regular guy? You become an entrepreneur! Take over a shop and get rich while building up your harem of monster girls in this comfy +18 hentai RPG!

name: The Summit Library
description: A Library that's falling apart, an Empire on the brink of war, and a dangerous magical mystery you've been tasked to solve. Set out to uncover the Summit Library's secrets and get drawn into the complexities of the Empire's politics; navigate love, truth, betrayal, and heartbreak.

name: FairiTeller
description: A story-based retro RPG: built upon impactful decisions, intense battles and challenging puzzles.

name: PortalSnake
description: Puzzle game about portals and snakes.

name: Entropy Survivors
description: Entropy Survivors is a bullet hell roguelite with 3D visuals, customizable weapons, and online co-op. Players simultaneously control Froggie, a sharp-shooting astronaut frog, and GERM, their melee-wielding mech, as they battle waves of the increasingly strong and numerous forces of Entropy.

name: Emoji Face Jump!
description: Jump action game. Emoji wanders in a broken world. Guided by a mysterious voice that tells them to aim for outer space to escape from here, they aim for the sky only by jumping. The mysterious voice curses you every time you fail. Will you be able to reach the universe while enduring the abuse?

name: Battlethorne
description: Battlethorne is a third person Conquest game with rpg elements and large scale battles.Conquer bases in a large open world, gaining loot and vanquishing your foes. Fight against multiple factions in a four way war across a 4.5 km2 open world using six unique weapon classes.

name: Dream Girlfriend: Doomer Girl
description: Dream Girlfriend: Doomer Girl is an adult-only visual novel, that will tell the story of Doomer's journey to find happiness

name: Internet Cafe Evolution
description: This is a business simulation + construction game. It tells the evolution history of Internet cafes that began in the 1990s, and also carries the youth of nearly two generations over the past thirty years.

name: Helen
description: You are Helen, a violinist content creator and office worker lost in monotonous life routines until you find a mysterious origami letter that embarks on a soul-searching journey of self-discovery. Respond to the letters, fold into origami, explore the town and find gratitude in small things in life.

name: Seductive Big Sister
description: [Seductive Big Sister] is a 3D interactive game, in the game, you play a newly released college student, your cousin took you to his house to play, in the his house, you met the sexy cousin's wife. And your sister gradually shows her hunger and thirst and has an unforgettable encounter with you 。。。

name: Chester The Chest
description: Play as an animated chest named Chester, embracing the captivating atmosphere and breathtaking scenery as you guide him on his journey. Play around solving simple puzzles and uncover cool objects and secrets.

name: Fly Wheel
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping world of Fly Wheel, where sparks fly in a spectacular display of robotics mayhem! Fly Wheel is a thrilling combat sports game that pits competitors against each other in an excitement arena, get ready to enter the arena of fierce combat, Join the competition now.

name: Grill on Wheels
description: Grill on Wheels is an immersive VR cooking experience that takes you on a culinary road trip like no other. Buy your food truck, customize it with the equipment, go shopping, and start the day! The real chaos starts there . Prepare your ingredients during the prep time early in the morning and get ready for the rush hours!

name: Black Sheep
description: You are the royal Shepherd ! Your mission is to bring the Black Sheep to the rival kingdom as a gift to stop the wat ! Go on an adventure to complete your quest but think wisely, the Black Sheep must arrive alive !

name: Princess Pomu and the 5 Moons
description: Paint without T is PAIN! Princess Pomu just lost her Kingdom and her family was captured, and now she's possessed by an evil spirit! Master the simple but satisfying combo system, get more abilities, pick up weapons, and explore the surreal world of Illeh in this cute metroidvania with a violent twist.

name: V Rising: Haunted Nights Castle Pack
description:
Capture the essence of the season of decay with the Haunted Nights Castle Pack.

Surround yourself with dark symbols, candles within skulls, and hollowed-out cadavers of gourds. Pair them with tasteful windows and carpets that reflect the color of the falling leaves, and dress your walls with some tasteful spiderwebbing to set the mood.

This pack provides a host of options to decorate your castle in the theme of the autumnal season when the scorching sunlight hours begin to wane, and the creeping claws of death slowly take the verdant green plant life. Don’t be afraid of getting used to them, as once you acquire these decorations, you’ll be free to use them regardless of the time of year. What is time to an immortal creature of the night anyway?

The DLC is unlocked in parts after completing the Journal Quests: “Lord of Shadows,” “The First book in the Library” and “Expanding my Domain.”

name: The Last Commander
description: You are the last remaining commander. Grow your sector well and protect Earth from invading alien spaceships for 50 days. Build the best building combination on the hexagonal terrain.

name: Slime Wars
description: Slime Wars is a cooperative multiplayer game that combines elements of the Top Down Shooter and Party-Games genre. The game recreates an arena capable of supporting up to 4 players simultaneously, in which players must face enemies in frenetic combat.

name: 4AM
description: Reclaim your life from the brink of death. Dive into a near-future dystopia where you will hide when you can, run when you have to and try to solve your way to safety in this "Inside" inspired adventure near-future dystopian

name: Stellarune
description: You've been cast out, left to fend for yourself in the Soul Sanctum with nothing but your ambitions, fleeting memories of the past, and your crumbling spell-inscribed die. In this unknown world covered with blood-tainted stars, it's time to begin your journey and escape the Sanctum's shackles.

name: Sophia's Spa
description: Visual novel about sexual affairs in Sophia's Spa.

name: Hentai Hunter
description: Are you ready to embark on this extraordinary journey, discover secrets, and find the keys to the chastity belts? Enter a magical fantasy world and take on extraordinary challenges as the Hentai Hunter!

name: Paw Patrol World: Halloween - Costume Pack
description: Help your PAWsome Pups turn into Halloween Heroes as they take on Humdinger's Mayhem with this ghostaclar skin pack.

name: Paw Patrol World: Rescue Knights - Costume Pack
description: Transform your pups into Rescue Knights and get ready for action across Barkingburg, Adventure Bay, the Jungle, and Jake's Mountain.

name: Streetoir
description: Streetoir is a first-person / open-world / graffiti-painting game, where you paint everywhere you want and whatever you want.

name: Anathema Tower Defense
description: Anathema Tower Defense is a Hero Tower Defense game where you command a powerful Hero and build and upgrade towers to fight back against increasingly powerful waves of enemies.

name: Untold Tales of Citadale: The Shadow Maker
description: As Gabriel Gorleac enter Citadale Castle and rid the lands from evil in this old-school, top down 2D RPG. Structured like a metroidvania with turn based combat, this adventure is filled to the brim with the undead, beautiful pixel-art locations to explore and eerie melodies to listen to.

name: Paw Patrol World: Ultimate Rescue - Costume Pack
description: Blaze a trail wearing the Ultimate Fire Rescue uniforms to give the PAW Patrol the fire-pup power to cool things down.

name: Paw Patrol World: The Mighty Movie - Costume Pack
description: Whizz around Adventure Bay and beyond saving the day in these heroic costumes from the Mighty Movie skin Pack.

name: Paw Patrol World: Aqua Pups - Costume Pack
description: Explore the world of PAW Patrol like never before and stop Mayor Humdinger's super blimp mayhem, in a free-roaming 3D adventure full of pup-tastic fun!

name: Stagelands: Eternal Defense
description: Defend your lands from crowds of enemies! Create a unique multi-floor defense of your kingdom! Arrange your troops wisely, use ancient magic, repel the onslaught of the enemy!

name: Trix: Witching World
description: Trix is a role-playing game in adventure mode made in Pixel Art. Explore and discover what happened in the village where Trix lives and complete the missions and quests to discover an engaging story.

name: Lizard Survivors: Battle for Hyperborea
description: They have launched an active invasion on our lands in late September this year, so let us break free of the slavic hand that held us by our balls for many ages! Rally all of our reptile militia, we will end this all together!

name: Buried
description: You wake up buried alive. You are running out of oxygen and you can't remember how you got here. There must be a way out, can you figure it out in time?

name: Lens Gloss
description: Lens Gloss is a dark, mysterious puzzle game inside an animator’s mind. You use different films to enter 3 worlds: his joyful golden past, his sombre blue present and his cold dark future.

name: Petey Pedro Unbeetable Adventure
description: A nostalgic game for those RAD 80's and 90's kids. Help Petey Pedro get back home after falling into a magical world where the sweets he chose over a healthy beet are now his worst nightmare.

name: WooLoop: Halloween Pack
description: This Halloween-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is eerie, kooky or otherwise spooky! Play this seasonal gallery if you dare!

name: Duel of Honor
description: Duel of Honor is a dynamic battle on flying motorcycles, a gloomy atmosphere, bright music and memorable gameplay. The victory will be yours!

name: Umbra Halloween
description: Umbra Halloween is a surreal psychological horror game about the dead ones returning to life on a Halloween night.

name: SameShadow: Fernando's Journey
description: "SameShadow: Fernando's Journey" is a third-person ARPG that immerses you in a fallen Ukrainian city. Explore the dark mystery that will reshape the world as you "awaken" extraordinary powers of time, matter, and space within you.

name: Killing Bullet
description: This is an exciting first-person shooting game. You need to defend against all enemy attacks and survive. You can use different types of firearms and throwing weapons to fight and kill every enemy you see.

name: Calm Cove
description: Build your dream island, bring it to life and make it flourish. Create nature, establish settlements and welcome villagers while watching your own miniature world thrive before your eyes!

name: RedLine
description: You craved a life free from trouble, with no gangs, no licks, and zero turmoil. But life had a different story in mind. To make things even worse, your last job, which meant to bankroll your retirement, took a turn for the worse...

name: Runemancer
description: Runemancer is a strategic party-based RPG game where you match runes to empower your team mates. Fight hordes of enemies and unlock new powers in this fast-paced single-player game.

name: Bad Mineral
description: A gritty local multiplayer, controller-based platform shooter with one heal per round.

name: Dubai Builder
description: Dubai Builder is a strategy game in which you build, develop and manage a city in the desert and are responsible for all aspects related to it and struggle with difficult climatic conditions.

name: Know Your Limits
description: Know Your Limits is a speed run game with speed limits. You can increase your speed by collecting coins, but it wouldn't be always the best choice. Go through all the obstacles and get your highest score!

name: 20 Small Mazes
description: This is a puzzle game with twenty small mazes. They're good mazes, though.

name: DemonCountdown
description: Demon Countdown is a Bullet Hell roguelike where hordes of Demons lurk in waves from hell, Kill all’em while sun is brightness… Every map is unique, and you can Play coop with your friends. Buy Skill boost Temporal! Will you be able to survive Before nightfall?

name: Dispel
description: Dispel is the third-person, action RPG that features permanent death and procedurally generated levels. Adventure solo in this challenging roguelike-inspired game.

name: The Backrooms: Escape
description: The Backrooms: Escape is a first-person walking simulator in which you need to survive and find a way to escape. Move freely, explore the secrets of the corporation, but remember - you are not alone.

name: Cycle Idle RPG
description: An RPG where your character is constantly grinding - even when you're offline!

name: Hokkaido Game
description: This is a physics puzzle game in which you build Hokkaido by piling up prefectures of Japan. You become a "big person" and drop prefectures into a box. Connected same prefectures will evolve into a larger prefecture! Create the largest prefecture in Japan, Hokkaido, before the box overflows!

name: Off Grids
description: the ultimate open-world survival game that redefines the genre. Welcome to a world where you get to experience hunting, gathering, building, crafting, looting, exploring and even travel in time from 2030 to 10.000 Bc. Your resourcefulness are your greatest assets. It's time to embrace the wild.

name: Fear The Void
description: Something goes wrong during your subway journey home, leaving you in quiet darkness. Can you find your way back to reality? And are you sure you're alone? An atmospheric horror game, that will get you consumed…

name: Reflection Witch
description: "Reflection Witch" is a Roguelike game that offers a unique reinterpretation of the classic brick-breaking genre. By drawing lines to create reflection panels, players can control and enhance the magic ball. Join the witch on an adventurous journey to explore the world of spells!

name: Brooks in Wild West
description: In this game will find diverse adventures with beautiful girls, fun times in the Saloon and lots of gunfights.

name: Queen of Tactics
description: Queen of Tactics is hexagonal grid turn-based tactical RPG. Manage four elements and use objects to follow journey to find the prince!

name: Only an Alien Going Up!
description: "Only an Alien Going Up!" is a difficult 3D platformer where your only goal is to climb to the top, without checkpoints.

name: LabWatch
description: LabWatch is an atmospheric horror / strategy / puzzle game where you must make sure every machine is working while avoiding dangerous enemies. Look through cameras to see which machines are not working and to know where enemies are currently roaming.

name: Flow of War
description: A classic RTS game that features auto-micro workers and warriors, freeing you to focus on your base defense strategy with a variety of towers and walls. Craft an army with MOBA-like heroes and units to counter your enemies' strengths and secure victory on stunning procedurally generated maps.

name: Tiki Tandems
description: Tiki Tandems is an online and local multiplayer PvP game. With fast-paced gameplay and easy-to-learn mechanics and combat it's a great game to play with your friends or grind against anyone worldwide!

name: Shadow Overlord: The Beginning
description: As a player, you will have to lead your armies of undead and magical creatures to expand Your empire and defeat your enemies. With an exciting plot and a challenging gameplay, this game will take you through epic and dangerous adventure battles while you become the most powerful ruler.

name: Loco-Sort
description: Loco-Sort is a puzzle-solving indie game, set in the railroads of the 1880s America. You control a small locomotive with the goal of assembling a train by sorting several numbered railroad cars across a maze of rail tracks and switches. 30 challenging levels, 9 playable locomotives and much more!

name: Fight or Flight VR
description: Fight and fly across vast alien worlds in Fight or Flight, a VR-exclusive FPS where physics-based locomotion and high-powered weaponry meet. Utilize a jetpack for tactical combat or swift escape in this high-octane shooter. Every moment demands a decision - will you fight or will you flee?

name: Wicked Brawler
description: A hack and slash game set in a fantasy world where you take control of a fierce female protagonist to fight off waves of peasants and orcs. Break boxes and chairs over their heads. Make use of many weapons with unique move sets to leave a trail of blood and broken furniture.

name: Edge of Survival
description: Escape to a relaxing, survival sandbox surrounded by wildlife and nature. Scavenge materials and craft tools to turn your base into a warm, well-supplied home. Survive by fishing, hunting, cooking, and growing your own food.

name: Pumpkin Ghost
description: A war between ghosts and machines has broken out in the underworld and it's up to you the pumpkin Queen to face her old friend and put an end to this spooky Halloween themed madness! Inspired by Touhou and Nier automata.

name: Crafting Combat
description: Crafting Combat is a medieval team-based strategy game where teams of players craft weapons to then fight for an objective.

name: Camp Counsellor Collector
description: Camp Counsellor Collector is a unique and challenging 2D pixel graphics, single-player game where you play as The Collector, a strong but scary Individual that lives in a mansion. Your job is to hunt and capture Camp Counsellor's, cute and sexy women that you keep in your basement.

name: Pestilence
description: Pestilence is a first-person stealth game in which you play as the Lord of the Pestilence, a betrayed God who seeks revenge against his brothers. Make use of your uncanny abilities to infiltrate this Spanish inspired city and infect their leaders.

name: Heros Fight Battle royal
description: Play Heros Fight Battle royal. Discover strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies, then survive to become the last team in contention in fierce battles over flag captures, target destruction, and more.

name: Brick Buddies
description: Duo-crane control in a goofy couch co-op challenge! It's a race against time and woolly obstacles. Grab a buddy, stack sky-high, rack up points, and beware of those sheep!

name: One Bear Army
description: You are Bear, a veteran of the elite Navy Bears unit in One Bear Army – a 2.5D action-adventure game in which you will face the evil Professor Rat and his army.

name: Stellar Settlers
description: Stellar Settlers is a sci-fi space-base building and colony simulation game. Take control of a space settlement, with unique vertical and horizontal base-building gameplay, build your own thriving colony on 5 hostile planets that want to destroy you. Pick and manage your talented Settlers.

name: ToiTony
description: A simple rage-inducing game. No saves. No Checkpoints. Only a scaffholding with... pain.

name: Totality
description: A simulation of a total solar eclipse, complete with time control, a pane of #14 welding glass, and a pinhole projector.

name: The Desire of the Amazons
description: Desires of the Amazons is a transformative erotic RPG game for adults. The main character is a knight, sent to fight the Amazons, but falls into an ambush and is slowly transformed into a woman by the sorceress Cassandra. During your transformation you will experience many sexual adventures.

name: Madman
description: The gameplay of this game is very unique,

name: Shadows of Rogue: The Sorcerer's Curse
description: In this game, you'll face increasingly relentless hordes of enemies and formidable bosses, all while discovering an array of valuable items and surprises along the way. Prepare for a casual yet intensely challenging gaming experience, with a wide range of battle combinations at your disposal.

name: Champion of Andia
description: CoA is an Action RPG Wave Progression game. Create a character and fight progressively harder waves of enemies in a directional based combat system. As you complete missions - you earn experience and gold to buy better armor and weapons. Play solo, cooperatively or PVP!

name: Asa-Chan Wants to Go Home!
description: This is a small adventure story... Asanuma Sayaka is an ordinary girl, but one day, she is suddenly transported to another world and becomes a hero. Here, she faces a tremendous challenge...

name: Stump Simulator
description: Stump Simulator is a game in which you can become a tree stump.

name: Horny Dungeon
description: Horny Dungeon is an NSFW roguelite turn-based RPG. Lead a team of captivating heroines, conquer dungeons and loot all the precious relics. Yet, the real treasures lie in the relationships you build along the way. And of course, they go beyond platonic...

name: Potion Permit: Halloween Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Nowhere
description: Alien Life Simulator

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Ambusher Pack
description: The Ambusher Pack contains an electronic caller, a lever-action rifle, and a takedown recurve bow, ideal for skillfully ambushing prey in the wild.

name: Dead Island 2: Haus
description: Lose yourself in a surreal, psycho-horror dreamscape as you explore a mysterious villa in Malibu. Descend through madness, debauchery, and gore, where survival means confronting a new wave of unexpected horrors.

name: Barton Lynch Pro Surfing
description: Barton Lynch Pro Surfing pits you against the world's best surfer's at the most exotic locations on the planet. More speed = more moves! Pump control uses the wave's power so you can surf faster and unlock more tricks. BL Pro Surfing features 12 world famous locations from point-breaks, to beach-breaks or deep water reefs. An in-depth leader-board sports game played out over an expansive world tour, or if you prefer just cruise the open world locations. Cutting edge graphics meets hardcore physics & at times, beautifully brutal waves. Pump, smash that lip, get sooo barreled and launch airs from waves that barrel, peak, break left, right, or just foam crumble. Customize your own character to within an inch of your life, or, play as some of today's top pros including: Yago Dora, Clay Marzo, Nathan Florence, Soli Bailey, Mahina Maeda, Vahine Fierro, Felicity Palmateer, and of course the legendary world champion, and Pro Surfing commentator Barton Lynch.

name: Sanabi: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghost Catchers
description: It's Halloween night and your school got suddenly haunted by ghosts. Try finding them all and catching them!

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Odyssey
description: Sin descripción

name: Freddy Fazbear's Pizza Massacre
description: Kill the lovely animal robots that scared us...

name: Curro Jimenez
description: Inspired by the television series of the same name, Curro Jiménez, the bandit protagonist, must confront the French troops occupying Spain. The character moves on foot or on horseback in the early stages, killing French soldiers while taking dynamite cartridges, since the final objective of the game is to bomb a French camp from air, using a balloon and the dynamite previously collected.

name: Whiskers
description: Whiskers is a point and click horror game. You are captured by the infamous Mr. Whiskers, a twisted lunatic. Your mission is to escape from his grasp. Find your way out by collecting items and interacting with other victims.

name: Senda Salvaje
description: Sin descripción

name: Piso Zero
description:
Rather simplistic game that came out when the 8 bits were already surpassed by computers and 16-bit consoles.

Similar to "Die Hard" we will have to go through the 15 floors of a building rescuing the different hostages while we finish with the different enemies that come our way. There are 7 different types of enemies.

name: Lakefront Restaurant
description: Lakefront Restaurant is a short experimental horror game that takes gameplay events and randomizes them leaving the player to question what's going to happen next without it impacting the story or gameplay.

name: Jump
description: The player controls an electromechanical robot that walks along a brick wall and jumps over it. A line of enemies approaches it from the bottom of the screen in a vertical direction, while the bomb floats horizontally in the center. Enemies can be eliminated by jumping over the wall, which causes a brick to fall. The number of jumps is equal to the number of bricks from the bottom of the wall to the robot.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel - Special Edition
description:
Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel, also known as Neon Genesis Evangelion: Iron Maiden, is a video game based on the Gainax anime/manga series Neon Genesis Evangelion.

The PS2 and PSP edition adds new scenarios, gallery and replay mode and an auto-save function.

name: Auxworld
description: Auxworld is a platform where users can generate endless gaming adventures using AI prompts and must escape the dreamworld before it turns into a nightmare.

name: Snakes On A Cartesian Plane
description: The mother of all snake games with 28 variations on that game you played on your candy bar cellphone.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 1 - Legend of the Golden Witch
description: A remastered version of the first episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 2 - Turn of the Golden Witch
description: A remastered version of the second episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 3 - Banquet of the Golden Witch
description: A remastered version of the third episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 4 - Alliance of the Golden Witch
description: A remastered version of the fourth episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 5 - End of the Golden Witch
description: A remastered version of the fifth episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 6 - Dawn of the Golden Witch
description: A remastered version of the sixth episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2: Collector's Edition
description:
Collector's Edition includes:

Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 full-game digital voucher code

SteelBook display case

19-inch Collector’s Edition statue: Spider-Man Peter Parker, Spider-Man Miles Morales, and Venom

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 7 - Requiem of the Golden Witch
description: A remastered version of the seventh episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Terror Quake 2
description: Terror Quake 2 is a mod for Quake 2 heavily influenced by Action Quake 2 and building off of it with a heavier lean into realism, new weapons and items.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 8 - Twilight of the Golden Witch
description: A remastered version of the eighth and final episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Dragon's Lair
description: The Japanese version of NES Dragon's Lair had a major overhaul in quality, being the fastest version of the game. It also has changes in level design to make the bosses less easier to be cheated.

name: Dragon's Lair
description:
The PAL version of Dragon's Lair expands upon the Japanese version, still having a good speed, but adding new enemy types and cutscenes in-between levels.

Contrary to other multiregional games at the time, the PAL version is a lot faster than the original NTSC version, despite the refresh rate being lower.

name: TO: Crossfire
description: Led by the people behind TacticalOps, backed up by a bunch of artists, modellers, mappers and supporters, the team behind TO: Crossfire pushes the limitations of Epic's Unreal Engine 2. Facing the choice of bringing terror to the world or fighting it, you will be part of decisive battles at locations you will not forget. Rescue hostages, blow up a building, gain information, assassinate a target - there is a vast variety of possibilities to decide a battle! And thus the assault continues...

name: Frag Ops
description: Frag.Ops is a semi-realistic FPS total conversion mod for Unreal Tournament 2004. Players can choose between two teams, Special-Ops and Mercenaries, each has an arsenal of customizable weapons to choose from. FO takes place in a fictional near future environment, with missions located worldwide. The gameplay in this modern tactical shooter is round based with different objectives for each mission. Be warned, Frag.Ops contains extremely fast paced action.

name: Feydome: Fairy Dress Up
description: FEYDOME is a short, almost relaxing game about exploring an abandoned world and finding clothing items to customize a playable fairy... it is part of the DreadXP End of Summer Bone Jam. It was made in slightly less than 14 days.

name: Park Beyond: Beyond eXtreme - Theme World
description: Blaize’s career is skyrocketing and this calls for a mind-blowing celebration. Join her in creating a brand new festival park that is perfect for dare devils... Stuntwomen... and Adrenaline junkies!

name: Wizard with a Gun: Gunmancer Pack
description: The Wizard With a Gun Gunmancer Pack includes the Dream Projector building recipe, Arch Wizard outfit, and Dandy outfit.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Germany 2
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Ophelia's Chapter
description: A story-rich, psychological-horror adventure game. Play as an urban witch with psychic abilities and delve into the mysteries of a world inspired by the work of Neil Gaiman and Stephen King.

name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - The Mountain Royals
description: Prepare to embark on a legendary journey as we introduce the "The Mountain Royals" DLC for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition. Unlock the rich history and untold stories of the Armenians and Georgians, part of three new campaigns!

name: Farm Bundle
description:
Handyman at your service!
You've got to earn it around here before you purchase your first property. No worries though! Luckily, there's plenty of work at your fingertips! Take job offers from nearby residents - clean up, paint walls, install heaters, showers, and air conditioners, or even furnish their whole property! Once the grateful clients pay you for your solid work, it's time to get your own house.

name: Farm Pets Bundle
description:
Farm DLC includes:
- 11 unique story orders!
