- 11 farm properties in a unique environment!
- 5 empty plots for you to build on!
- 9 exciting mechanics, including the possibility of building extensions of your house!
- Over 1850 farm-themed items!
- 7 farm animals such as cows, sheep, chickens, and more!
- 6 animal products and 6 types of crop plants that you need to take care of!

name: Edna & Harvey Bundle
description: Classic point-and-click adventure gameplay like in the good old days! Experience these two classics full of bizarre characters, wacky (and sometimes twisted) humor, crazy dialogue and challenging puzzles.

name: Realms of Alurya
description:
Synergy Land is an Action RPG game that integrates MOBA mechanics into a player-driven world that allows players real ownership of digital game assets, set in a fantasy world divided into four ecosystems: earth, water, fire and ice.

The player will take on the role of a hero, exploring dungeons and undertaking a great adventure against very powerful creatures.

​Inspired by popular games, such as Diablo and Albion Online, the game aims to combine the best of these worlds where regular and hardcore players will enjoy the gameplay experience as well as an ecosystem for players who want to collect and trade.

name: Heavy Traffic
description: Top-down motorcycle racing game in which the player navigates his vehicle through heavy traffic.

name: Super Erect Taisen S-EX
description:
You begin with the main hero and 3 girls and battle through 15 SRPG style stages, using their school as a home base between battles. At the school, you may buy items, change party members, and speak to girls on your team. After each stage, a new girl will join you, and, in total, there are 19 girls.

Each girl has at least one H-scene.

name: Streets of Rage Zombies
description: It's Streets of Rage with zombies! This bloody beat 'em up was created as an OpenBOR project and released in 2017 on ChronoCrash.com. Play as one of six Streets of Rage fighters, including a zombie, and smash your way through hordes of disgustingly awesome mutilated corpses of the undead. With great sprite-based graphics and fast and fluid brawler gameplay, creator suhmai adds a worthy entry into the homebrew OpenBOR database.

name: Pickleball One
description: Dive into America's fastest-growing sport while making new friends! Master Pickleball anytime, anywhere, whether as a single player or with up to 4 participants. Beyond just singles and doubles, this app includes in-depth fitness and training modules, that will elevate both your physical and virtual gameplay. Experience a mixed-reality setting for immersive wall drills, practice sessions, and workouts.

name: Out of Scale: A Kurzgesagt Adventure
description:
In this VR app, you explore the worlds within worlds around you from inside your mobile scale lab as you travel to five levels of scale - molecular, bacterial, insect, human, and mountain. You're joined by STEVE, the lab's AI assistant, who shows you the different effects of biology, physics, and chemistry in each realm. Together you'll scan objects, find hidden ducks, and observe science in action. You will complete four missions around giant ants, a tardigrade, a protist, and giant fungi that have accidentally been scaled up by using scientific concepts and scaling objects up and down yourself.

In addition to the base game, there is a Multiplayer Theater where players can invite their friends and watch Kurzgesagt videos together in VR. There's also a Mixed Reality Sandbox where players can bring objects and creatures they've unlocked in the game into their home.

name: EX-Xdriver
description:
EX-Xdriver is a hardcore racing-rhythm game with a diverse songlist of high-energy tracks.
With over 50 featured artists and tons of fun but challenging charts, you'll always find yourself pushing for intense clears and higher scores.
Alongside standard button controls, EX-Xdriver features analog stick gear shifting and gyro-controlled drifting to keep gameplay dynamic and engaging.
Whether playing solo, or in competitive multiplayer, use drifting to your advantage and go for a new record!

name: Chrono Commando 2053
description: "Chrono Commando 2053" offers an exciting gaming experience that combines time travel and military action. Led by Ömer Halis, a special unit ventures through the depths of time to fight for the salvation of humanity. Players witness pivotal moments in history and wield the power to manipulate history to save the world.

name: October Nightmares
description: Explore a Montréal neighborhood in the 70s, investigate a supernatural phenomenon that inflicts nightmares on its residents, and delve into the depths of the world of dreams to save their lives. October Nightmares is a point & click cosmic horror game where exploration mixes with puzzle solving.

name: Croakoloco
description: Croakoloco is a frog collecting idle game. Watch them jump, croak, and eat delicious flies. Grow frogs, feed frogs, or take control of one in “Froggy Mode” for a more active play style!

name: Esferibot
description: What happened on this automated space station? Take control of Esferibot, the last working robot on the base and try to find it out

name: Hello, This Is Bear
description: "Hello, This Is Bear" is a game where you control a little bear to solve sokoban style puzzles. Bear may be small, but is more than strong enough to push around a variety of heavy looking puzzle mechanics.

name: PNG Mall
description: Trapped in a sprawling and abstract shopping mall realm, you must explore, run, and hide in order to escape. Use your stereoscope to hunt down CDs, raid cash registers to buy items from vending machines, and sprint to safe zones when danger is near!

name: Grooove
description: Grooove is a fun asyncronous music game, where two players help eachother to get out of a haunted mansion with the power of music!

name: Project Star
description: A fast paced looter shooter set in a scifi world. Purge, loot, upgrade and repeat.

name: Project Mist
description: Join the Project Mist in this new open world survival horror. Explore an enigmatic Island. Fight against colossal monsters. Build and defend your base while crafting traps, siege weapons, upgrading your gear and Gravity Gun. Survive or perish while unraveling the secrets behind the giant wall!

name: Greedy in the Dark
description: Greedy in the dark is a slow-paced platformer game with Metroidvania elements. You venture into the dark caves under the abandoned factory to loot stuff, obviously you didn't take any equipment for moving in the dark (it's pricy nowadays), you 100% sure there will be something useful on your path.

name: Spooky Dwellers 2: Collector's Edition
description: Save your parents' house from mischievous spooky dwellers in a thrilling Match 3 ghost-hunting journey. Unleash talismans, conquer puzzles, and restore harmony!

name: Inferius
description: Descend into the underworld of "INFERIUS," a first-person, card-based game inspired by The Divine Comedy. Solve puzzles, battle creatures, and reclaim your soul in an ever-draining health race. Unleash strategic card combat and descend through 9 haunting levels on a journey of redemption.

name: The Man from the Window 2
description:
"Time will pass, the seasons may change, we know that nothing can ever stay the same...
But still The Man continues to play his twisted game."

name: Argo
description: Argo is a unique roguelite action strategy game in a minimalist style. Use combos to use abilities, dodge enemy attacks and defeat the Void, Hell and Pestilence bosses. You don't have to do it alone either, because you can play the entire game in online co-op mode!

name: Eva
description: Eva is a 3D Action-Adventure game set in a dark, retro-futuristic world, blending combat and exploration elements into a unique and immersive experience.

name: Baskerville
description: A sci-fi visual novel reimagining The Hound of the Baskervilles (1902). Follow Vornovians Sherr-Lok & Watt-Sun as they try to uncover the legend behind a old family curse.

name: Along Came a Dragonfly
description: Strange creatures from another dimension have appeared all over the land. Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and capture monsters to fight them back, and discover a mystery best left forgotten.

name: Li'l Red
description: Hop, skip, and jump with Lyra as she journeys back to her homeland in this retro adventure. With harp in hand, no foe is a match for Lyra and her animal friends.

name: Vivaldia 2
description: Pitted against relentless robotic foes and navigating through dense and perilous jungles, scorching lava fields, and treacherous swamps, Vivaldia once again seems faced with an impossible challenge.   With the fate of the land in her hands – will Vivaldia rise to the occasion?

name: Solune
description: Enter Solune, a world of fantasy and magic! This turn-based JRPG is inspired by the classics, with modern improvements. Challenge yourself with 50 optional puzzles, discover hidden secrets and face off against powerful end-game bosses, all while on an adventure to save the world!

name: Abyssal Survivors
description: Fight thousands of monsters in the abyss and survive your delve! Abyssal Survivors is an anime casual game with bullet hell and rogue-lite elements. Build your party of unique delvers with overpowered combination!

name: Dino
description: A collection of 2D games built in one project, an open-source monorepo. The games mostly start as jam submissions, but are growing to cover a range of genres, including metroidvania platforming, top-down adventuring, beat-em-up action, puzzles, runners, and more! Dino is built with Godot.

name: Vindictive Drive 2
description: Build Robot Maids to battle massive robots! Try to contain the massive invasion as you unveil a dark story of revenge. Go to the Wagie Cage, where Wagie(that's her name) will build them for you. The Maidbots are voiced by professional Anime dub, videogame and TV/Film VAs.

name: Keep Keepers
description: Chaotic co-op fun meets deep strategic decisions. Fortify your keep while balancing income and defense to expand your arsenal and to automate your economy. Every run changes enemies, challenges, tools and weapons. Hire up to 3 friends – or defend alone!

name: Love Potion
description: Love Potion is an engaging visual novel that takes players on a heartfelt journey through the complexities of love and self-discovery.

name: Xiao La: Fantasy Dream
description: Xiao La: Fantasy Dream is a lovely freehand wind Galaxy Castlevania game with a high degree of freedom, in this game, you can use a variety of strange game methods to complete the game! Come on, join the game!

name: The Voluntary Chipping
description: You have resieved an invitation from the "Greenhouse" corporation for free chipping. But you have a choice not to be enslaved! You have to fight back against cyber machines.

name: Mosaic Girl Savior
description: This is an elimination adventure game. Women's country was suddenly shrouded in a mysterious force, women were played on the Mosaic of evil, in order to explore the truth behind, restore the original appearance of women's country, as the "first gentleman" you embarked on a journey.

name: Couch Kittens
description: yeah Its a couch cat game. Finally! a no luck party game that everyone can play.

name: Cat & Gold
description: A 3D side-scrolling action game in which a cat retrieves stolen gold.

name: Genie Gym
description: Compete at one-on-one sports matches or solo in stylized arenas and themes. Use your Genie to master your skill, win matches, and exercise too! Come explore traditional game styles that have been reimagined for something new on the VR.

name: Dungeon Adventure Gang
description: Dungeon Adventure Gang is a co-op top-down multiplayer roguelike where you and three other adventurers team up to explore this unmarked dungeon as far as possible. Explore, gear up, reunite, and push on.

name: Submersible
description: Submersible is a 1st person, Singleplayer, Ocean explorative, Horror game.

name: Kov
description: Sin descripción

name: OcculThieves
description: OcculThieves is a local competitive game for 2 to 4 players where your opponents are invisible. Keep an eye on each other's screens, cheating is the key to victory! Compete on 21 different maps and 3 game modes. Never let them see your next move coming!

name: Sempiternal
description: Sempiternal is a psychological thriller survival game. In the universe of back rooms, you will experience the loneliness to the fullest and find yourself in a different mystery in each level and get lost in the back rooms.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Fortresses and Focke-Wulfs - Dieppe
description: IL-2 Sturmovik: Fortresses and Focke-Wulfs - Dieppe is a realistic and challenging combat flight simulation set over the embattled beach fortress of Dieppe, France in WWII. Fly and fight in Focke-Wulfs, Messerschmitts, Spitfires, Typhoons, P-51’s and B-17’s as the iconic Raid of 1942 unfolds below.

name: Dashes & Squares
description: Squares? Ready. Dashes? Ready. Random level generation? Ready. Be prepared to this endless survival game where you need to dash into your enemies and upgrade yourself to survive.

name: Ruin
description: Ruin is a free to play survival sci-fi sandbox MMORPG indie game where you try to survive on mankinds attempt to colonize a distant planet. Chances are stacked against you, but don't give up. You are most likely the last human alive. It is up to you and you alone to do what you must to stay alive.

name: DreadMoon
description: Jump into DreadMoon, a stylized arena FPS blending fast-paced action with stylized visuals. Experience a co-op campaign and a fun multiplayer shootout, all while a captivating soundtrack amplifies every moment. Where echoes of the past meet the thrill of today.

name: Hell Hunter: Damned Soul
description: A story driven adventure horror audiogame in which you have to interact with room elements, survive to environment gimmicks and fight real time battles based only on stereo audio. Learn the enemy patterns and hear where the attacks come from to dodge their attacks in time and then attack.

name: Pigsaw: Human Abattoir
description: Escape the nightmarish human abattoir in this blood soaked first person shooter.

name: Bounce Ball Blitz
description: Master precision and conquer challenging levels in this addictive 2D basketball platformer. Aim, bounce, and score your way to the top!

name: Debt Deadline
description: We drag you onto David’s headspace: A disturbed Debt Collector hustling on the surreal Naked City. In this survival narrative psycho-thriller RPG, you use secrets to manipulate, craft alliances, and create murder schemes. Manage your sanity or your mind will turn against you.

name: Vagrant Strider
description: Vagrant Strider is an Arcade Action Adventure RPG Redefined. Cursed by a vanquished evil without a home to return to. The hero will journey to the ends of existence. In order to find a way to stop the curse that is slowly engulfing everything. A one of a kind retro experience...not to be missed!

name: The Red Juggernaut
description: "The Red juggernaut" is a retro-style JPRG crossed with a modular ship building & combat game. Level up your ship, build it bigger, battle enemy ships, explore the solar system, and save the human race!

name: Don't Touch the Purple
description: Don't Touch the Purple ("DTTP") is an endless side-scrolling arcade platformer where you make your way through a randomly generated assortment of levels and get as far as possible before dying.

name: Starnaut
description: Starnaut is a 3D action game includes the elements of Roguelike. The player will become the Starnaut, a surviving astronaut and experience the thrill of beating up endless spawning enemies then launch the Omega Rocket to complete level. Collect the coins and upgrade the weapons and equipment!

name: R Body Adventure
description: A 3d platformer in a futuristic world ! In this hexagonal tale, make your way around the globe to stop Mr.Body's plan ! Fight dozens of robots, gear up & save the planet toward a greater future !

name: Zipp's Café
description: Love, betrayal, and coffee! Zipp's Café is a "noir & chill" little game about a café between the city of animals and the district of insects. Make unusual recipes, get involved in shady dealings, and try to start a new life while searching for love and revenge.

name: GraveBond
description: You play as a young boy whose dog has died. Head down to Necros, the realm of the underworld, to find your dog and bring him back home!

name: DemonStar: Original Missions
description: The Shareware legend Demonstar comes soaring back with new game modes, revised gameplay, and new Eastereggs to encounter. Originally published in 1997, and later earning Shareware Game of the Year 1999, Demonstar was, and still is one of the highest rated Space shooters ever created.

name: Vice City Race
description: Welcome to the world of speed and adrenaline, welcome in Vice City Race!

name: Crazy Cursed Grandma's House
description: Explore Japanese houses and deal with the curses that attack you!

name: Day of Judgment
description: In Day of Judgement, a dark fantasy management roguelite, lead a guild of heroes, wield enchanted swords, craft elixirs, and safeguard villages from a demon invasion. Your tactical mastery in combat and resource allocation will shape the fate of the realm.

name: Escape from Manimal Island
description: Escape from Manimal island is a relaxed paced linear role playing adventure. This game would appeal to those who want to figure out the puzzle of finding your way off of Manimal island without being chased and or hunted while doing so. It is story driven with easy on the screen instructions!

name: Dragon Hop
description: A 3D precision platformer, where you control a tiny dragon, collect hidden treasures, fight enemies and try to reach the top, while exploring beautiful areas.

name: Master of Deception
description: As Cheryl approached the target of one of her scams, she accidentally discovered a great secret about this mysterious man, dragging her into a complicated situation from which she could not escape! In order to escape from this weird situation, Cheryl’s solution was…to have sex?!

name: Eastern Europe Train Sim 2
description: Take the helm of a powerful locomotive in "Eastern Europe Train Sim 2."

name: The Night Watch
description: The Night Watch is a retro-styled survival horror set in an abandoned shopping mall that shut down in the 1990s. Investigate overnight vandalism reports as a night watch security guard. Assemble a team in online co-op mode, or venture in and take on the job alone.

name: Spooky Tower
description: You have been left alone. Your only tools are your trusty jetpack and your item spawner. But your spawner has malfunctioned and will only spawn random items! You must ascend the tower to fix your tool and defend your outpost from the approaching danger!

name: Projeto Real
description: Projeto Real is a game where you shape your virtual life. Choose professions, build authentic relationships and explore a wide, vibrant world full of fascinating NPCs. Face challenges, explore stunning landscapes. Live a complete virtual life, full of unique adventures.

name: Al Bassel
description: Al bassel is a turn-based puzzle game where you play as a soldier trying to save his kingdom from foreign invasion. you will strategically maneuver around the battlefield and try to outsmart and outmaneuver your enemies.

description: The Ump Show is a baseball umpire simulator where you balance making accurate calls and enforcing your will on the game. Make accurate calls but cheat to make sure your favorite team wins!

description: Guide Peepo to the top of the mountain in this precision platformer. Charge each of his legs to determine his jump trajectory, but be careful any mistake will send Peepo falling back down.

The IPECAC Community Mod is a mod focused around the community, and as such, a large portion of our content is ideas given to us, by you! (Maybe not you in particular, but you get the idea)
We’ve gathered ideas from all over the Internet, from reddit, to discord, to our website, we’re happy to do our damnedest to make anyone’s ideas a reality!

name: Ludo Local Multiplayer
description: Ludo is fun to play a local multiplayer board game that can be played between 2, 3 or 4 players. It is the most popular and fun game to play with family and friends. Ludo is a mind refreshing game with its lucky dice rolls and strategical gameplay. This interesting 2D Ludo game has been around us for a long time as the best game to play in our spare time.

name: Gearhead Karting: Mechanic & Racing
description: The ultimate kart racing game with deep customization, realistic physics, and a variety of game modes. Build, tune, and race your way to victory!

name: End The World
description: Bring the End of the World in this story-driven retro title about love and hate, light and dark, and all the ways everything could end in a snap. Play as multiple characters as you traverse the kingdom of Ionis trying to put an end to tyranny by any means possible.

name: Dungeons 4: Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full Dungeons 4 game,the digital artbook and soundtrack, nostalgic Dungeons 3 skins for Thalya and your Evil Hand, as well as a remaster of the classic Dungeons 3 map "The Storming of Dollaran".

name: Elemental Wizards TCG
description: Elemental Wizards is a card strategy game where mages challenge each other in mystical duels to bring honor and glory to their clan. Each mage counts with a vast spell knowledge, henchmen, and allies who assist them in their fight to subject the enemy forces.

name: Warzone Tower Defense
description: Warzone is a tower defense game featuring high-tech weaponry and large open maps with varying landscapes. The goal of the game is simply to survive as long as possible. There are also several different game modes available for those looking for a new twist on the game.

name: Being Home Alone With You is Worse Than Death
description:
Includes three games - Home Postmortem Edition, Alone With You, and Worse Than Death

- Home: Postmortem Edition : The complete, original indie horror classic, rebuilt for Nintendo Switch
- Alone With You : Experience more than a dozen missions, including lush agroponic installations, vast research labs, and the eerily-quiet cabins of your former colleagues
- Worse Than Death : Action-adventure gameplay that sees you crawling under objects, vaulting over obstacles, and racing for the nearest hiding spot to stay safe

name: Warzone Tower Defense Extended
description: "Warzone Tower Defense Extended" expands upon the original game adding new tower upgrades and other unlock-able enhancements.

name: The Interval
description:
Agent Wells, it's time to prepare for your most dangerous and critical mission yet.
At 0600, your colleague and mentor Agent Cross, powered up the Time Interval Device and made an unsanctioned jump into the distant past. Her motives are unclear, but given her combat skills and precognition, she could irreparably alter the course of human history, in direct violation of the Institute's pursuits.Your mission: to find and eliminate Agent Cross, wherever and whenever she may hide.To avoid exposing past humans to our advanced technology, you must deploy unarmed and scavenge equipment on-site.
We have every confidence in your success, upon which our continued existence depends. Good luck, Agent. Commencing time-jump in 3... 2... 1..."

The Interval was made in 2022 during the month of May for the first Reload Magazine Game Jam.

name: Trench Punk
description: A dieselpunk Wolfenstein 3d inspired first person shooter.

name: Zombies Rising Dawn
description: Embark on an epic journey where you'll boldly defeat legions of relentless zombies, from the dawn of time to the end of days

name: Athletics Mania
description: Join a competition in track and field events. Running, jumping, throwing, pentathlon, heptathlon or decathlon, you can play all of these in Athletics Mania. Train, improve your skills, show your talent and win a gold medal in the biggest stadiums around the world. Do you have what it takes to stay on top of leaderboards and rankings in this summer sports game?

name: Bounce Touch
description: Bounce Touch is a part of Nokia’s Bounce series of games. It is a 3D platformer. Released for Symbian S60 3rd, 5th Edition & Symbian^3. For N97, It comes pre-installed on the XpressMusic 5800.

name: Akizora Memories: Horizon of Fate
description: 「あの頃に帰りたい─、たとえその先が暗闇だとしても─」『学園もの×SF』でお送りする青春SFビジュアルノベル。平凡な学園生活で、青春を謳歌する主人公とヒロイン。しかし、学園にはある病気と、世界を変えてしまうような秘密が潜んでおり……。

name: S.T.A.G.
description: Apparently in the year 2567 Earth gets destroyed. A big shame. Some survivors, who presumably had been out walking the dog at the time, decide to set up a trading company. They plan to exploit the alien worlds, all of which have less sense of economics than Nigel Lawson.

name: Neppachi: 10-renchan de Las Vegas Ryokou
description: Neppachi: 10 Ren Chande Las Vegas Ryokou is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Falcon and published by Daikoku, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Sigil Valley
description: This game has no ending. explore a tranquil moonscape, touch sculptures, learn their glyphic language and hear their songs.

name: Mister Gas
description: Mister Gas is a single player action/reflex video game for Amstrad CPC, created and published by Xortrapa Soft in 1990.

name: Rescue the Prisoner
description: Rescue the Prisoner: Classic meets modern in this heart-pounding FPS. Unleash tactical chaos, save hostages, and rewrite your gaming legacy.

name: Gothic II: Odyssey
description: The Odyssey takes place immediately after the unnamed hero leaves Khorinis and sets out for Myrtana. Meanwhile, the hero of the failure, Roland, resides in the paladins' sea stronghold on Athanos as one of the recruits. The war with the orcs bypasses this island, but despite this, our hero dreams of becoming a paladin and decides to share the main one with the greenskins. He decides to go out to achieve his dream, but not everything is as simple as it appears at the beginning. He has to go through procedures and a bumpy road, as well as many exciting and difficult cases. He becomes acquainted with the necessity of exclusion and their intentions. The idea is to establish Beliar's rule and enslave all humans or, if that is not possible, destroy them. Roland quickly realizes that what matters on his journey is not the destination, but the path he will take. So he goes by himself, strongly opposes the invaders and defends the independence of the people of the Kingdom of Myrtana.

name: Fleet Battle
description:
This boardgame offers everything that made the classic so popular. Defeat ship after ship and rise through the ranks - from Seaman Recruit up to Admiral of the Navy.

Pit yourself against the computer (singleplayer), random human opponents (Quick Match) or your friends (Play with Friends) and prove you have the makings of a real Fleet Commander. If you're looking for a fun, fast-paced naval battleship-style combat game - look no further.

name: Art-O-Ween: A Ghost in the Gallery
description: Explore the art gallery like never before as you join Bop and Ghostie in the search for their missing dog over Halloween Night!

name: Kuroobi
description:
Kuroobi is an horizontal shoot'em up for Playdate where you take on spaceships with your bare hands.

Get ready to show off your martial arts prowess in this action-packed game. Do you have what it takes to save the day with only your fists?

name: Gotta Bounce
description: An upcoming platformer for the Playdate.

name: Initial Daydream
description: Initial Daydream is a Pulp RPG in the style of NES JRPGs, specifically the early Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy entries. Towns, dungeons, turn based battles, goofy plot and dialogue; you name it, we got it!

name: Roboctletes
description: A futuristic robot track and field game for playdate.

name: Wi-fi Dungeon: Organism Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadowgate PD
description:
Shadowgate is one of the most well-known and beloved point-and-click adventure titles in gaming history. As one of the original titles in the popular MacVenture series that went on to be celebrated on the NES, GBC, and Nintendo 64, Shadowgate quickly endeared players with its fantastic atmospheric soundtrack, perilous locations to progress through, countless puzzles to solve, and more ways to gruesomely die than gamers previously thought possible.

Developed by Pixel Ghost, Shadowgate PD is being lovingly reimagined for the Playdate console using Pulp, a web based game making tool made by Panic.

name: Pullfrog: Deluxe
description: Tetris meets frog! A little puzzle platformer made for Pico-8, equal parts fun and challenging. Help a little frog clear as many lines as possible by using its tongue to pull around blocks in the air.

name: Eyeland 2
description: The second game made by Ron Lent for Playdate.

A 3-week game jam by the Mega Crit team to explore the Godot engine due to "recent events". It happens to coincide with Jump Ship Jam: https://itch.io/jam/jump-ship-jam ✨

A deckbuilding autobattler dance off with a BUMPIN' soundtrack
